entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
